title: betnomi.com
author: betnomi.com
created_time: July 26, 2022, 02:06:08 PMLast edit: August 11, 2022, 06:02:40 PM by betnomi.com
content: Hello people! As you understand from the name, Betnomi is looking for a new slogan!The rules are very simple!No multi-accountsApplications from Full Members +The slogan should be simple and consonant!You can not offer slogans of other bookmakers!No more than two slogans per userWe will consider applications until August 10!Users can edit their post until this thread is lockedThe winner will receive $100 in Bitcoins!

comments.author: Smartvirus
comments.body: Haven't been here for some time, I think opportunities such as these are often abused. It won't be surprising to get a lot of spam in this thread with users leveraging the fact that, there aren't any rule set to limit or offer some moderation to the thread and contest. I'll advice you put rules such as;Unofficial Rules* One trier per account* No alt account participation* Limit participations to ranks (To avoid this looking like some bounty threads)* Users can or are free to edit there posts until 8th August 11 : 59 forum timeThis would go a long way to cut down some abuses that could result in some low level spam by some cunts and low level piece of shit that are constantly looking to earn some quick money on the forum. You can consider a few other rules too.

comments.author: betnomi.com
comments.body: Thanks, I've updated the OP. But it's not entirely clear to me how to determine if the accounts are connected to each other?

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: Quote from: betnomi.com on July 26, 2022, 03:08:07 PMThanks, I've updated the OP. But it's not entirely clear to me how to determine if the accounts are connected to each other?if the alt account has been tagged by DT members it will be seen in their trust rating whether it is neutral or red tagbut since there will only be one winner, it seems that concentration on multi or alt accounts is not very important because no one will be able to get the two prize

comments.author: Igebotz
comments.body: This is going to be fun!I have two idea slogans! Hope it's no somewhere else already. Lol  1. You Bet. We Pay!2. Stake Less. Earn More!I will edit if I think of a more better options

comments.author: Z-tight
comments.body: Quote from: betnomi.com on July 26, 2022, 03:08:07 PMThanks, I've updated the OP. But it's not entirely clear to me how to determine if the accounts are connected to each other?It would just act as a deterrent, it does not mean that you'd start looking for connected accounts that have joined your competition, you'd just have to include it as a rule so member's would understand that it isn't allowed. That doesn't mean it will stop some member's from trying to join the competition with alts, but by doing so they have broken the competition rules, and they can be tagged if they are caught.Just take it as every other rule we have out there, it does not mean people won't attempt to break it, but it is there so if they are caught they do not say there was no rule against what they did, so that way you will reduce the number of offenders as people would not want to get into trouble, and those who go on to break the rules might be caught. Don't trouble yourself looking for connected accounts that break rules, there are members here who will do that for you.Quote from: Strongkored on July 26, 2022, 03:22:10 PMbut since there will only be one winner, it seems that concentration on multi or alt accounts is not very important because no one will be able to get the two prizeBut someone that joins the competition with more than one account, with different slogans on all accounts has increased their chances.On the topic, let me go think about a suitable slogan, i will either edit this post with it, or make a new one, cheers!

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: This is interesting, it feels good to hear feedback from other's opinions, there could be something better coming out, Let me give my attempt as well, i have two suggested slogans below.1. Play Jack, Win Jackpot2. Winner's Arena Game Play

comments.body: 1. Make The Next Big Bet2. Win Better

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: This is a nice event, i will give it a try, but i would like to know how the Prize will be paid, you will send it to a Betnomi account or to a bitcoin address?.And a little more information about how you will decide the winner would be nice too.So, here are my two Slogan:1.- Betnomi - Where you win with your bets and with your cryptos.2.- Betnomi - Print money while have fun.

comments.author: DU18
comments.body: 1.Play and Win your prize with betnomi2.We are the leading and trusted  casino in the world

comments.author: edgycorner
comments.created_time: July 26, 2022, 06:42:02 PMLast edit: August 09, 2022, 03:35:05 PM by edgycorner
comments.body: 1.) Trade your luck2.) Bet, set, roll!

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: Strongkored on July 26, 2022, 03:22:10 PMbut since there will only be one winner, it seems that concentration on multi or alt accounts is not very important because no one will be able to get the two prizeAssuming if five accounts which are alts participate in this contest, the chance that the user with the alts to be the winner will increase even if he later do not win. So this should be forbidden. But alts will not be concentrated on, but one day, the alts can be connected and linked to be controlled by the same user. Then the result for such as he participate in this type of contest if noticed would likely be red tag. Having the rules at least will make many users to avoid using their alts as different users regarding this.

comments.body: 1. Bet on me.2. Bet your way

comments.author: skarais
comments.body: It seems good to provide some answers, this is a rare event and a shame to miss. Some slogans from me to you., Good luck.1. Win more crypto on our planform. Your bet is our responsibility.2. Register, Play your favorite games, and win crypto with us.
